name: Craig David
description: '''Craig Ashley David''' {{post-nominals|country=GBR|size=100%|MBE}} (born 5 May 1981) is an English singer. He rose to fame in 1999, featuring on the single "[[Re-Rewind (The Crowd Say Bo Selecta)|Re-Rewind]]" by [[Artful Dodger (duo)|Artful Dodger]]. David's debut studio album, ''[[Born to Do It]]'', was released in 2000, to great commercial success. In total, David has released nine studio albums: ''[[Slicker Than Your Average]]'' (2002), ''[[The Story Goes...]]'' (2005), ''[[Trust Me (Craig David album)|Trust Me]]'' (2007), ''[[Signed Sealed Delivered (album)|Signed Sealed Delivered]]'' (2010), ''[[Following My Intuition]]'' (2016), ''[[The Time Is Now (album)|The Time Is Now]]'' (2018), ''[[22 (album)|22]]'' (2022), and ''[[Commitment (Craig David album)|Commitment]]'' (2025). Over his career, David has collaborated with a diverse array of artists, including [[Sting (musician)|Sting]], [[Tinchy Stryder]], [[Big Narstie]], [[Tiwa Savage]] and [[JoJo (singer)|JoJo]].
